summary: This document is an arrest warrant issued for Jeffrey Epstein, commanding law enforcement to arrest him for charges related to sex trafficking conspiracy and sex trafficking of minors. It includes details about the charges and the court's jurisdiction.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the accused individual in this arrest warrant, facing serious charges related to sex trafficking.

persons.name: Alison Moe
persons.context: Alison Moe is mentioned as the AUSA responsible for the case against Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Barbara Moses
persons.context: Barbara Moses is the judge who signed the arrest warrant for Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Alison Moe is the prosecutor handling the case against Jeffrey Epstein.
Barbara Moses is the judge who issued the arrest warrant for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Issuance of Arrest Warrant
events.description: An arrest warrant was issued for Jeffrey Epstein for charges related to sex trafficking.

keyFacts: The arrest warrant was issued for Jeffrey Epstein on July 2, 2019.
The charges against Epstein include sex trafficking conspiracy and sex trafficking of minors.
Alison Moe is the Assistant United States Attorney involved in the case.
Barbara Moses is the U.S. Magistrate Judge who signed the arrest warrant.
The document emphasizes the urgency of arresting Epstein without unnecessary delay.
